website_summaries.verdict: This 2-phone charging pad supports Samsung Fast Charge and can charge later iPhone models in 3 hrs. or less.
pros: Charges 2 Qi-enabled phones up to 15W power output simultaneously
Supports Samsung Fast Charge – some Samsung phones can receive the full 15W
iPhones 8, 8+, and X can receive up to 7.5W
takes about 3 hrs for iPhone 8+ and X devices
cons: Wireless charging is slower than wired charging, but it protects charging port and battery life

customer_reviews.title: Thermal protection not evident
customer_reviews.text: Advertised with temperature shut off feature, used with a galaxy S7 with a Otterbox Defender case. The rubber on the outer case insulated the heat. The charging pad got hot enough to discolor and put a shine under the phone. Charger still works and phone but apparent lack of internal heat regulation on the charger allowed enough heat build up to discolor the charging pad. Do not use with rubber case covers and discount the value of thermal protection.
customer_reviews.author: NeutronFlux

customer_reviews.title: An alternative for the cancelled AirPower
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is pretty straight forward, it comes with different adapters to plug into the wall which I assume would be convenient for the avid international traveler. The product has a relatively small footprint and it can fit pretty anywhere. I wanted this product to charge my new AirPods and iPhone XS. So far, it does what it’s supposed to, it wireless charges my AirPods case and phone. Unfortunately it warms up my phone and AirPods case too much. It’s a very noticeable thing. I am not sure if this is normal or not or if it will be a detriment to the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sooo SLOW!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in this charger... it takes FOREVER to charge one phone, much less TWO phones! Not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Works Flawlessly for iPhone XS
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike about this product, does exactly what it describes. Fast charges both iPhone XS’s at once or one at a time. With or w/o a case, and it doesn’t matter where you place the iPhone down on the pad. The shipping was extremely fast and I will be ordering another dual wireless pad after this review. I’ve been using it since the 21st of September and will follow-up after several months have passed.
customer_reviews.author: Conscious Geek

customer_reviews.title: product did not work--i am returning it
customer_reviews.text: Your product did not work in charging my iphones 6 and 6X. I am returning your product
customer_reviews.author: Will Charlton

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged - disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The product was supposed to be new but had been opened and repackaged - possibly from another customer returning it. The product is as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Vick

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed! Charged quickly but what I like most is just about wherever you put you phone it charges. I recently returned another brand because it was very particular where you put you phone, this unit isn’t. Also like the long power cord it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Tom A

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh....
customer_reviews.text: Charger keeps charging after device is charged, to the point device is very warm not only after reaching full charge, but for hours after as well. Charging location is small, especially for size of charger, and can be a bit difficult to locate.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Duo Fast Charger
customer_reviews.text: Works just as described. I can wirelessly fast charge both an S7 and a S9+ at the same time. Good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: DRRIZAY

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge unless phone is correctly positioned
customer_reviews.text: Often does not charge if the phone is not positioned in a particular way. I’m an MD and often get calls at night and it need to use my phone so I find it did not charge because it was not optimally positioned,
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Klein

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Just was getting the galaxy s10 a bit hot while charging.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: All as announced
customer_reviews.text: Working fine. Recharges Iphone XS Max very quickly. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Victor S Russo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect charger
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my iPhone 8 and AirPods 2. No issues charging, no problems finding the ‘sweet spot’. Just place my devices and walk away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The only drawback is if you have a thick case on your phone it may not charge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend. I leave my phone for hours on end, only to see it charge about 10%. It also heats up my phone too much, so I can’t use it until I let it cool off.
customer_reviews.author: Anvi

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: A bit of a small hot spot but it’s not so small that It is any big issue. Quick charge. Great item
customer_reviews.author: Time To Remember

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I would recommend this to any one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what is said it would do!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a charge plate for my iPhone 8 and my wife's iPhone. I read that many of the chargers would not do two phones as fast as they claimed. The Zens works as advertised and charges both phones at a very fast rate. There is no confusion about how to use it and it takes up almost no room on our counter. Finally a product that does what it claims!
customer_reviews.author: inspectorudy

customer_reviews.title: Works great Can charge 2 phones.
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for when we travel. We don’t have to pack all the cords or 2 wireless charges.
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Overall good value. The size supports the ability to charge two devices which includes actually means two phones. I like the increased size as it provides a larger sweet spot for charging your phone. I’ve used it to charge multiple phones and AirPods .
customer_reviews.author: And One

customer_reviews.title: Not good stick to a normal charger
customer_reviews.text: Had to send it back would only charge one thing and that too would take ages
customer_reviews.author: Anita

product_meta.title: ZENS Wireless Charging Pad - Dual Qi Charger Pad with 2X 15 Watt Power Output - Supports Apple iPhone and Samsung Galaxy Fast Charge - Includes AC/DC Adapter - Black
